text:
@mikandynothem @realDonaldTrump @DineshDSouza @DonaldJTrumpJr @RitaCosby @Chicago1Ray @LaylaAlisha11 @FIGHT_2_KAG @skb_sara @AMErikaNGIRLLL @Jamierodr14 @KatTheHammer1 He also said that COVID-19 was a hoax
He also said that it would be under control by the end of March
He also said that Kim Jong-un is a very nice guy
He puts himself first and if the policies that help him and his family help you, then lucky you, otherwise he does not care!
